summary.description: linking assembly graph motifs to biological variants | MetaCarvel: A scaffolder for metagenomes | MetaCarvel - Scaffolder for metagenomes | MetaCarvel is an updated version of previous metagenome scaffolder Bambus 2. To run MetaCarvel, you will need Python 2.7.x, Samtools, Bedtools, Networkx(Version < 1.11), NumPy,and OGDF
summary.name: MetaCarvel
